archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: Albert Brown graduated from Virginia Tech in 1938 with a degree in Agricultural Engineering. Collection consists of Virginia Tech memorabilia and class assignments from Brown's time at Virginia Tech. Materials date from 1930 through 1938.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Albert M. Brown Collection, Ms2009-122, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Albert M. Brown Collection was donated to the University Archives in Special Collections in 2001.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement and description of the Albert M. Brown Collection began in January 2009 and was completed in September 2009.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Albert Magruder Brown graduated from the Virginia Polytechnic Institute in 1938 with a degree in Agricultural Engineering. While attending VPI, Brown served in various capacities for the Virginia Agricultural Engineer. Brown was also involved with the American Society of Agricultural Engineers as well as the Mid-Tidewater Club and the 4-H Alumni Club. Brown was a member of the cheerleading squad his last three years and served as head cheerleader as a senior.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Collection consists of Virginia Tech memorabilia and class assignments of Albert Brown dating from 1930 through 1938.

did.unittitle: Photographs - VPI Organizations and Athletic Teams, 1935-1936
Papers on Power and Fuel Consumption, 1938
